mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_SM_MARKET_HIS (ID, BATCH_NO, MOBILE, IS_INSTANT, SEND_TIME, SEND_MSG, SEND_STATUS, RET_MSG, SM_CHANNEL_TYPE, SEND_SM_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, OPERATOR, SM_SOURCE) VALUES
(#{sm.id}, #{sm.batchNo}, #{sm.mobile}, #{sm.isInstant}, #{sm.sendTime}, #{sm.sendMsg},#{sm.sendStatus},#{sm.retMsg},#{sm.smChannelType}, #{sm.sendSmType},#{sm.createTime}, #{sm.modifyTime}, #{sm.operator},#{sm.smSource})
